name: The Game Dev Disasters
description:
"Game Dev is fun, but motivation is a problem." - Me, 2020

A game by Living in Code and StaberDevs

This game was made for the Wowie Game Jam 3, the theme was "Failure is Progress".

The idea was a top down shooter where every time you die, you get a buff. Sounds good, right? Well we really didn't think about it very much. The problem with this is the only way we could make this fun is to add way more complexity. Oh well, I'm happy with this.

The game is about a game developer trying to make a game but facing all the struggles. It's really hard to understand the story but im happy with the execution, just think the idea is flawed.

Have fun!
